biotools.summary: A lineage analysis algorithm called Label-free IdeNtification of Endogenous informAtive sinGle cell mitochondrial RNA mutation for lineage analysis and clonal Evolution (LINEAGE) by integrating the low cross-entropy subspaces identification with a consensus clustering method.
